pages.text:
863-453-6395
Avon Park, Florida
Meet our Team
Jodi Susco, Regional Operations Manager
Jodi Susco the Regional Operations Manager is originally from Minnesota and has been with Rickert Properties for over 18 years. Jodi loves to read books, spend time with family & friends, and cares for the resident’s furry friends by carrying treats in her golf cart! We are happy to have Jodi aboard our Rickert Properties teams as she does an exceptional job in keeping the community looking fantastic.
Mark Joyce – General Manager
Mark Joyce serves as the General Manager of Villa Del Sol, bringing over 12 years of experience in the Manufactured Home industry. Originally from the UK, Mark and his wife moved to the United States 35 years ago and have called the Sebring area home since 2013.
Mark began his career as a community manager at Reflections on Silver Lake in Avon Park and steadily advanced, overseeing daily operations, maintenance, new home orders, and sales for Legacy Communities. Most recently, he played a key role in the rebuilding of a 470-home community in Fort Myers that was devastated by Hurricane Ian in 2022.
With a strong passion for community development and resident engagement, Mark is excited to be part of Villa Del Sol and looks forward to getting to know all the residents.
Vicki White – Community Manager
Vicki was born in Florida and raised in upstate New York, Vicki returned to the Sunshine State to retire—only to discover her true passion in community management. Since 2019, she has worked with our team. Vicki is dedicated to fostering a warm, welcoming environment at Villa Del Sol, where residents feel heard, valued, and connected. From planning engaging events to offering personalized support, Vicki’s goal is to keep Villa Del Sol a vibrant and inclusive place to call home.

Contact Us
Villa Del Sol is part of the Rickert Properties family.  Please feel free to contact us at 863-453-6395 or fill out and submit the form.
Rickert Properties believes that each resident is important in a successful community. Residents tell us they selected a Rickert Properties community because the lifestyle is a lot of fun for such an affordable price. The tremendous financial strength, coupled with expert management, makes each Rickert community a winner!
